{"step_by_step_thinking": "Based on the information provided in the documents, the vasopressor of choice in pregnancy is phenylephrine. Document [2] also mentions that phenylephrine is the vasopressor of choice for preventing and treating spinal-induced hypotension during Caesarean section.
